channel.title: inventories – Angry Bear
channel.description: Slightly left of center economic commentary on news, politics and the economy.

item.title: Question of the Day
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Is it really Good News that changes in Real Private Inventories were 3.4% of that 5.7% Q-on-Q GDP in Q4? (h/t Alea’s Twitter feed) Most reasonable assumption: firms overproduced, relative to actual buying, in anticipation of the Xmas season. Maybe more later.
item.content:encoded:
Is it really Good News that changes in Real Private Inventories were 3.4% of that 5.7% Q-on-Q GDP in Q4? (h/t Alea’s Twitter feed)

Most reasonable assumption: firms overproduced, relative to actual buying, in anticipation of the Xmas season.

Maybe more later.
